customer_addr:
3202 West Sierra Vista Drive
Phoenix, AZ 85017

citations.narrative:
There is an accumulation of dried feces on the floor between enclosures for the adult cotton top tamarin and adult
common marmoset and the adjacent wall. The wall also has excessive brown streaks and splatters on it. The licensee
states the last time the wall was cleaned was over a month ago (before 10 July 2025). Not maintaining appropriate levels
of cleanliness can lead to accumulations of excreta and food debris which can attract pests and create a disease hazard.
Housing facility surfaces must be cleaned and sanitized when necessary to satisfy generally accepted husbandry
standards and practices.
Correct by 31 August 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n
